summary: A monthly bank statement from Municipal Credit Union (MCU) for an account holder, covering June 2019. It details numerous personal transactions including purchases, transfers, and deposits from entities like the DOJ and USDA, suggesting the account holder may be a government employee or contractor. The statement shows routine personal spending with no direct mention of Epstein-related figures or events.

keyFacts: The account holder received two direct deposits from 'AGRI TREAS 310' (US Department of Agriculture) and one from 'DOJ TREAS 310' (US Department of Justice) in June 2019.
The statement shows frequent, small-value transactions at fast-food restaurants, pharmacies, and retail stores, indicating routine personal spending.
Multiple transfers were made to individuals named Tania, Washington Tarin, and Washington Catia via Cash App and bank transfer.
The account is with Municipal Credit Union (MCU) and includes a checking account and a personal loan.
No names directly associated with the Epstein case (e.g., Jeffrey Epstein, Ghislaine Maxwell, alleged victims) appear in this financial record.
